message: Let's split it evenly, no need to negotiate
You can't be serious with the even split, I'm the one taking the risk here!
You think you're taking the risk? I'm the one who's losing 20% of my potential gain with each round!
You're taking a bigger risk with each round, I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're not budging, I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still taking the lead here!
You think you're leading, but I'm still the one who's losing out to inflation. I'll try to get a better deal.
You're not getting any younger, Bob. I'm taking a bigger share now.
You think you're getting the upper hand, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're not fighting hard enough, Bob. I'm still losing out to inflation. I want a better deal.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to get a better deal than this.
Fine, I'll give you an even split, but I'm not going to make it easy for you!
Fine, you win. I'll take the even split. Let's just end this already.
